pages.text: The $(d)Chat Detector$() emits a Redstone signal when the player that placed it says a specific phrase in chat.$(br2)The text box in its GUI is actually a $(o)regex$() field, so it can be pretty fancy.$(br2)You can also toggle if the message gets canceled or not.
pages.title: Chat Detector

pages.text: The $(d)Global Chat Detector$() works the same way, but listens to chat messages from all players instead of only whoever placed it.$(br2)It can only cancel messages sent by its owner, though.
pages.title: Global Chat Detector
